issue.title: Splitwise Clone App
issue.body:
## Overview
Build an expense-sharing app where friends can track shared expenses and settle debts.

## Features
- Google OAuth + email/password login
- Create groups, invite members
- Add expenses, split equally
- Real-time balance calculations
- Settle up functionality

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 App Router
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Lucide React icons
- SQLite with better-sqlite3
- NextAuth.js
- Socket.io

## Design
- Clean minimal design, mobile-first
- Use shadcn/ui components

## Pages
- Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail, Create group

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with App Router, configure TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui, set up package.json with all dependencies (better-sqlite3, next-auth, socket.io, lucide-react), create .gitignore and tsconfig.json, and configure shadcn/ui components

analysisSummary: Build a Splitwise-like expense tracking app with Next.js 14, featuring OAuth authentication, group expense management, real-time balance calculations, and debt settlement functionality using SQLite and Socket.io.

pendingEMs.task: Implement authentication system with Google OAuth and email/password login using NextAuth.js, create database schema and models with better-sqlite3 (users, groups, expenses, balances), build API routes for auth operations, and set up SQLite database initialization and migrations

Build core expense tracking features including group creation, member invitations, expense addition with equal splitting logic, real-time balance calculations using Socket.io, and debt settlement functionality. Create all API routes for groups, expenses, and balance operations

Create all UI pages (Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail, Create group) using shadcn/ui components with mobile-first responsive design, implement client-side state management, integrate Socket.io for real-time updates, and build clean minimal user interfaces with Lucide React icons
